owl:Ontology.dc:creator: Javier Chamorro (CRTM)
José María Díez (Ayuntamiento de Burgos)
Luis Criado (CRTM)
María Jesús Fernández Ruíz (Ayuntamiento de Zaragoza)
Oscar Corcho (Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid, and LocaliData)
Rodrigo Medrano Calderón (Escuela Técnica Superior de Ingenieros Informáticos)
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Vocabulario para la representación de datos de la infraestructura de medios de transporte
owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: Este vocabulario se utiliza para la descripción del dominio de la infraestructura de los medios de transporte. Esta ontología reutliza elementos de otras ontologías como la ontología de transportes Naptan.
owl:Ontology.rdfs:label: Transporte Público
owl:Ontology.owl:versionInfo:
En esta versión se han agregado las siguientes clases: - Operador - ZonaTarifaria
Además se incluyeron las siguientes propiedades: - operador - coronaTarifaria
Se ha omitido de la descripción de la ontología la parte en la que se mencionaba que se reutiliza términos de una ontología sobre unidades territoriales.

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: Where there is a street that intersects the Street, as well as a Landmark, the name of the crossing street may be included separately here.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Crossing

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicative description of the relative position of the stop, for example, "100 yards from Town Hall". Bay Stand or Stance number should be placed here.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Indicator

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: Description of the nearest landmark to the stop, for example 'Town Hall'. Or nearest street crossing that can be used to distinguish stop from other stops in the street, i.e. Landmark may be a crossing.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Landmark

owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:comment: Street of stop. May be road name eg B2710.
owl:AnnotationProperty.rdfs:label: Street

rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:comment: The ATCO recommended coding for stop areas (groups) as defined in the NaPTAN specification.
rdfs:Datatype.rdfs:label: Stop Area Code

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Indicates whether the entity this annotates is available for use. Use of this attribute allows entities to be retired without deleting the details from the dataset.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Status

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: La parada del medio de transporte pertenece a una zona tarifaria.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: corona tarifaria

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Propiedad que indica que una zona de parada como las estaciones o intercambiadores tienen paradas que no están en la calle.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Tiene parada no en la calle
Línea a la que pertenece una parada

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: El medio de transporte es gestionado por determinado operador.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: operador

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Parada que pertenece a una línea
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: parada

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Propiedad inversa de tiene parada no en la calle.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Es parada no en la calle de

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Dígito que indica el modo del intercambiador
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Modo Intercambiador

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Distintos sitios donde se encuentran las paradas, ya sean esta en la vía pública o dentro de una estación
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: Tipo de parada

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Número del sector urbano dónde se encuentra la parada
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Sector urbano

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Tesela en la que se encuentra la parada
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: Tesela

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An airport PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Air Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An airport.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Airport

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Airport Building.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Airport Building
On street Bus / Coach / Tram Stop
Bus / Coach bay / stand / stance within Bus / Coach Stations

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Bus / Coach Station.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bus Or Coach Station

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A bus, coach or tram stop
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bus Stop

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clustered on-street Bus / Coach / Tram stops.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Clustered On-Street Bus Stops

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Coach Service Coverage.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Coach Coverage

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A coach station PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Bus and Coach Stop Point
Custom (unmarked, or only marked on road)

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A ferry terminal or dock PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ferry Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Ferry Terminal / Dock Building.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Ferry Terminal Or Dock Building
Hail and Ride - requires Hail and Ride section

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A metro, tram or underground station PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Metro Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Multimode Interchange.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Multimode Interchange

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Station, interchange or other off-street access point
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Off Street Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: On street access point
owl:Class.rdfs:label: On Street Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This stop is not part of the service registration and is not liable to inspections or enforcement; it is not expected to be used as part of the timetable.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Other Bus Stop

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Other Structure.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Other Structure

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Paired on-street Bus / Coach / Tram stops.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Paired On-Street Bus Stops

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This stop is part of the service registration and is liable to inspections and enforcement.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Principal Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This stop is a Principal Point which is expected to be also used as a timing point within a timetable.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Principal and Time Info Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A railway station PTAN.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Rail Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Railway station.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Railway Station

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A grouping of adjacent NaPTAN stops.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stop Area

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A NaPTAN stop definition.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Description of period for stop activity.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Period of Stop Validity

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A taxi rank
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Taxi Stop Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: This stop is not part of the service registration and is not liable to inspections or enforcement, however it is expected to be used within a timetable to identify a timing point which will not be a Principal Point.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Time Info Point

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tram / Metro / Underground Station.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Tram Metro Or Underground Station
Metro and Underground Platform Access Area

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tipo de parada de autobús. Este tipo de paradas se encuentran dentro de los intercambiadores o estaciones de autobús
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Dársena

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una estación de autobús
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Estación de autobús

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una estación de cercanías
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Estación de Cercanías

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una estación de metro
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Estación de metro

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una estación de metro ligero
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Estación de metro ligero

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Conjunto de instalaciones que permite a los pasajeros la comunicación y enlace entre diversos medios de transporte [fuente: Diccionario de la Real Academia (DRAE) 2014]
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Intercambiador

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Son las líneas de los medios de transporte
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clase que representa una línea de autobús
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea de bus

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clase que representa una línea de metro
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea de metro

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clase que representa una línea de metro ligero
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea de metro ligero

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clase que representa una línea de tranvía
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea de tranvía

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Clase que representa una línea de tren (por ejemplo, de Cercanías)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Línea de tren

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tipo de parada de autobús. Protege a las personas de la lluvia y del frío
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Marquesina

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Operador de los medios de transporte
Operador de los medios de transporte.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Operador

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una parada de cercanías
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parada de cercanías

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una parada de metro
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parada de metro

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Una parada de metro ligero
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Parada de metro ligero

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Tipo de parada de autobús
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Poste

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: Zona que permite definir la tarifa del sistema de transporte.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Zona Tarifaria

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier of the area.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Administrative Area Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Airport associated with a stop point.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Airport

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: ATCO code for area.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ATCO Area Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Full NaPTAN stop identifier that uniquely identifies the stop within the UK.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ATCO Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A 20 bit number used for wireless cleardown of stop displays by some AVL systems. Number format defined by RTIG.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Cleardown Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Nationally unique identifier for coach Stop Point used by a coach company. (Including for example stop codes used by the National Express Group).
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Coach Stop Point Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Coach stop associated with a stop point.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Coach Stop

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Eight point compass bearing (N, S, E, W etc)
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Compass Point Bearing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Three letter Computer Reservation System code identifying a station. e.g. KGX.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: CRS Reference

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Bearing in degrees
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Degrees Bearing

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: National Ferry code for ferry port.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Ferry Reference

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: International Air Transport Association code for the airport.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: IATA Reference

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Whether the locality is a centre or not.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Locality Centre

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: NPTG Localities for which the stop is a main interchange point, that is one of the main PTANs for accessing the network.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Main NPTG Locality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Metro code for underground station.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Metro Reference

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Short NaPTAN code for passengers to use when uniquely identifying the stop by SMS and other self-service channels.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: NAPTAN Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier of the district.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: NPTG District Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier of the locality.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: NPTG Locality Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Parent locality. Reference to another locality that contains the child locality completely. Must not be cyclic.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Parent NPTG Locality

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Code that identifies any parent stop area of the area. Many levels of parent hierarchy are allowed.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Parent Stop Area

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Plate number for stop. An arbitrary asset number that may be placed on stop to identify it.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Plate Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier of the Plusbus Zone.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Plusbus Zone Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Unique identifier of the region.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Region Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Stop that the stop has been transferred to.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Replacement Stop Point

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Code that uniquely identifies the stop area within the UK.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Stop Area Code

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Description of period for stop activity.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Stop Validity

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: TIming Point LOcation Code . Character code 4-6 alphanumeric characters e.g. CHST, KNGX, KNGXBAL. Non-rail locations may also have TIPLOCs.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: TIPLOC Reference
